column1: Smoque BBQ////Very nice rustic feel to a place with great flavors.  Personally my favorite part is the Bourbon and meat combinations
column2: natural flavors that go hand in hand.  Service is great
column5: one thinks that I am the quiet
column6: reserved type by stating that. Quite the contrary
column7: but I don't like yelling across my table to talk about everyday subject matters.  I don't know if its the people
column9: or lack of sound absorbing ceiling tiles
column11: but its loud enough to keep it from being a five star review.
